meanings.definition: A straight line passing from side to side through the center of a circle or sphere.
meanings.sent1: The diameter of the circle was easy to measure.
meanings.sent2: The diameter of the sphere was longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: The diameter of the cake was so big, it could feed the whole party!
meanings.sent4: The diameter of her smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The diameter of the tree trunk was so wide, it took three people to hug it.

meanings.definition: The distance from one side of a circle or sphere to the other, passing through the center.
meanings.sent1: She measured the diameter of the circle with a ruler.
meanings.sent2: The diameter of the sphere was twice the length of the radius.
meanings.sent3: The pizza's diameter was so large, it barely fit through the door!
meanings.sent4: The diameter of the moon seemed to glow in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The diameter of the canyon was so vast, it seemed to stretch on forever.
